speaker: alSimon
text: You're in trouble, Goldbird. Depower your weapons and do what we say.

speaker: player
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: Goldbird? What is that?

speaker: player
text: Okay, what do you want from me?

speaker: player
text: Pirates, huh? You'll be lucky if you live after this.

speaker: alSimon
text:
I don't think you realize you've nowhere to escape, we've got you in our claws.

What we want is simple - give us your cargo, and there's a chance we'll let you go.

speaker: player
text: I thought I was the "Goldbird", now you have claws too?

speaker: alSimon
text: Goldbird, that's what we call ones like you, in your large, gilded craft. You Crown lot really love your wasteful luxuries, don't you?

speaker: alSimon
text:
You got me off track there.

We've come to take your cargo, but we're feeling merciful today. If everything goes smoothly, we'll let you live.

speaker: player
text: I can take on both of you, let's fight.

speaker: player
text: I'm ready to cooperate, what do you want me to do?

speaker: player
text: I can trade the cargo, for a bit of information.

speaker: alSimon
text: Your odds are getting worse with every quip.

speaker: bettySimon
text:
*tries to de-escalate because they are desperate for resources*

maybe somebody hired them and threatened that there will be repercussions if they do not bring anything back

text: Is there a particular ware that you're looking for?

speaker: player

speaker: player
text: Not push them and keep them talking

text: We're not that fussy, anything that's useful.

text: Desperate, huh?

text: I happen to have some confiscated electronics shipments in my cargo.

speaker: player
text: I don't have many useful things, this is a diplomatic vessel.

speaker: player
text: You can have it but I need proof you'll let me go.

speaker: player
text: I'm not giving you anything.

speaker: player
text: You want me to 'do' my cargo?

speaker: alSimon
text: We'll show you how diplomacy works in the pirate world...

speaker: alSimon
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: alSimon
text: You have our word, pirates never lie. They only steal.

speaker: alSimon
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: It's funny you want me to believe that.

speaker: alSimon
text: Look, we mean no harm. We're professionals, leaving bloodtrails like this would do us no good.

speaker: player
text: You're being awfully polite all of a sudden. Are you afraid of me?

speaker: player
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: Makes sense. I'll send you the cargo.

speaker: player
text: Professionals leave no witnesses. I'm not convinced.

speaker: bettySimon
text: We kind of need the cargo, we can't go back with nothing.

speaker: alSimon
text: It's against the pirate society code. We're bound to de-escalate and prevent violence at all costs. Our goals are purely economical.

speaker: alSimon
text: Don't you think every faction would want us dead at this point if we were to operate with such recklessness?

speaker: alSimon
text: Shut up Betty...

speaker: alSimon
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: Why is that, is someone extorting you?

speaker: player
text: That's sad, but I gotta go, thanks for the lovely conversation.

speaker: alSimon
text: Look, just give us something, and we'll let you live, we're asking no more.

speaker: player
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: Okay, here's a deal: You tell me who you're working for, and I send you over an electronics shipment I confiscated earlier.

speaker: player
text: There's no way I'm giving you anything.

speaker: alSimon
text: That leaves us with no other option...

text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: bettySimon
text:
We'll take it, alright? My boyfriend's an idiot and he'd get us both killed to save his face.

We're in trouble, in fact. We signed up for this new business offering in the capital [city of some planet].
It all looked good, just a simple private mail carrier service. Soon after signing up we learned of the true nature of the job - piracy.

speaker: player
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: alSimon
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: I'm just not convinced by your arguments.

speaker: player
text: Fair point, I'll send you my cargo. Better to avoid this fight.

speaker: alSimon
text: Seems you don't want to cooperate.

speaker: player
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: Well, you two are idiots.

speaker: player
text: Maybe I can help you.

speaker: player
text: This is unfortunate, but that's life. You gotta deal with this yourselves.

speaker: alSimon
text: You're right.

speaker: alSimon
text: How?

speaker: player
text: We have a few positions open for mail carriers ;)

speaker: player

text: I have contacts, could get you a new job in the investigations department.

speaker: player
text: Becoming part of the Crown 'lot' probably wasn't on your menu today, but I'm starting to sense it might not sound half bad now.

speaker: player
text: Just kidding... although

speaker: alSimon

speaker: bettySimon
text:
Yeah so, we work for [name of smuggler organization]. We joined a few months ago.

The whole operation is run centrally from [planet]. I can tell you more later, but now we have to cover our backs, you have to understand.

text: I need to know more, that's little use to me.
